data.eml:eml: A contribution to the revision of Adorodocia Brenske (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Rutelinae: Adoretini): a new peculiar species from Ankaratra, Madagascar

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Frolov, Andrey V., Montreuil, Olivier (2018): A contribution to the revision of Adorodocia Brenske (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Rutelinae: Adoretini): a new peculiar species from Ankaratra, Madagascar. Zootaxa 4442 (3): 498-500, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.3.12
